item.title: [COLOR deeppink] -> [/COLOR][COLOR white] 2017 - GP Australia - Carrera[/COLOR][COLOR yellow] -> MotoGP - Moto2 - Moto3 [/COLOR]

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('[B][COLOR orange]* [/COLOR][/B][B][COLOR springgreen] GP Malasia [/B][/COLOR]', ['[COLOR yellow]MotoGP[/COLOR]', '[COLOR yellow]Moto2[/COLOR]', '[COLOR yellow]Moto3[/COLOR]']) channels = ['https://archive.org/download/MotoGP.Australia.2017.Carrera.MovistarF1.EventosHQ/MotoGP.Australia.2017.Carrera.MovistarF1.EventosHQ.mp4', 'https://archive.org/download/Moto2.Australia.2017.Carrera.MovistarF1.EventosHQ/Moto2.Australia.2017.Carrera.MovistarF1.EventosHQ.mp4','https://archive.org/download/Moto3.Australia.2017.Carrera.MovistarF1.EventosHQ/Moto3.Australia.2017.Carrera.MovistarF1.EventosHQ.mp4'] return channels

regex.name: lista
regex.listrepeat: <SetViewMode>55</SetViewMode> <title>$pyFunction:'[lista.param3]'.replace(".mp4", " [COLOR deeppink]Mgck[/COLOR][COLOR lime]Pi[/COLOR]").replace(".avi", " [COLOR deeppink]Mgck[/COLOR][COLOR lime]Pi[/COLOR]").replace(".mkv", "[COLOR deeppink]Mgck[/COLOR][COLOR lime]Pi[/COLOR]")</title> <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link> <thumbnail>https://i.imgur.com/aJ4O796.png</thumbnail>

regex.name: search
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Buscador de peliculas y series:', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d
